name: Bruce L. SMITH and All Others Similarly Situated, Appellant v. Honorable Pedro A. CORTEZ, Secretary of State of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee

parties: Bruce L. SMITH and All Others Similarly Situated, Appellant v. Honorable Pedro A. CORTEZ, Secretary of State of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of May, 2006, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Bruce L. SMITH and All Others Similarly Situated, Appellant v. Honorable Pedro A. CORTEZ, Secretary of State of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 24, 2006.
